name: scorchingly
content:
scorchingly adverb
(HOT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very hot: scorchingly hot The whole state has been scorchingly hot this summer. They grow all sorts of chillies, from the mildest to the scorchingly strong. The sun shone warmly, at times even scorchingly, through a thin veil of clouds.
More examplesFewer examplesThese galaxies are filled with scorchingly hot gas.It can be cold here at night during winter, but the summer is scorchingly hot.The curry was spicy, but not scorchingly so.

scorchingly adverb
(CRITICIZING)
in a way that criticizes someone very severely: His article was so scorchingly rude that he will probably never be able to work there again. She gives a scorchingly honest account of her life there.
